body.note:
If you want to use a language without a corresponding p-i18n-xx.css stylesheet, follow these instructions:
Copy one of the available stylesheets (located in the /plugins/com.oxygenxml.pdf.css/css/print/i18n directory) into your CSS customization (other than the English one because it does not have the :lang pseudo-class since it is the default language).
For each rules, replace the :lang(xx) pseudo-class with your expected language code, then replace each property value with the expected label.
